TopicTitle: Plugin to lock/unlock control surfaces in flight?

Articles.Content: So I've build a Space Shuttle type thing, and I'm having the problem of the Rudder causing unwanted roll, and making the craft unflyable. Obviously the moment of yaw is off centre from the centre of mass, causing the unwanted roll. Is there a plugin that lets you turn off the control surface, for example with action groups? This would really help my build, without having to use some sort of detachable counter fin on the underside of the shuttle.

If you are talking about the stock control surfaces, my Actions Everywhere mod adds those actions so they can be added to action groups as you are asking.

D.
